Reviews.Title: RELIABLE,DEPENDABLE & REAL FAST!!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie D.
Reviews.Content: Bought mine USED but it was wiped clean like it was brand spankin' new again...I haven't had not one problem and not one issue with this BEAST and the i5-430m w/2.26GHz has built-in TURBO-BOOST that I've clocked reaching almost 3.0GHz!! Love this laptop!!

Reviews.Title: It was fine
Reviews.Author: nathaliathetwin
Reviews.Content: I should have expected this since I bought it used: the battery didn't work and it came with a few viruses but I fixed it up and bought a new battery so all good.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Very fast. I use Adobe CS6 and it runs so smooth even editing videos. Clear bright screen and good battery life. The video card is an Intel HD so I'm limited to World of Warcraft and Minecraft but both played in the highest resolution and so did HL2.All around great laptop.

Reviews.Title: Sweet laptop!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent laptop that will not break your budget. The video card is lacking a little bit. (When playing World of Warcraft, I had to lower all the graphics options in order to have a decent frame rate.) But other than that it is a solid performer. I will be using it primarily for photo editing and it handles that like a dream.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: A. Mupo "Angelo Mupo"
Reviews.Content: Great laptop I bought the HP G62-149WM at Walmart for $569 and have seen it recently online from walmart for $598. The screen size on this model is 15.6''

ProductInfo.Features:
Screen Size: 15.6"
Screen Resolution: 1366 x 768
Processor Type: Intel
Processor Model: i5-430M
Processor Speed: 2.26GHz
ProductInfo.Name: HP G62-149WM 15.6" LED i5-430M 2.26GHz Laptop
